TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Menu extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class Menu Inherits Component
public ref class Menu abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 表示所有菜单的基本功能。

span.span: Represents the base functionality for all menus.

summary.span: 虽然 和 取代了以前版本的 控件并向其中添加了功能，但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和供将来使用。

span.span: Although and replace and add functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是 、和 类的基类。This class is the base class for the , , and classes. 不能创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 应用程序的菜单由 对象组成。The menus for an application consist of objects. 这些对象可以包含其他 对象，这些对象表示子菜单项。These can contain other objects, representing submenu items. 可以将 对象存储在 中，以显示为用于显示快捷菜单的窗体或 的整个菜单结构。The objects can be stored in a for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a that is used to display shortcut menus. 此类提供所有菜单类通用的功能。This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes. 与许多基类不同， 类使用其派生类定义其许多属性。Unlike many base classes, the class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties. 如果在多文档界面（MDI）应用程序中使用菜单，则可以使用 属性指定显示应用程序中打开的 MDI 子窗体列表的 。If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the property to specify a that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application. 属性包含存储在菜单类中 对象的列表。The property contains a list of objects stored in the menu class. 对于 或 ，此属性包含显示的所有 对象。For a or , this property contains all the objects that are displayed. 对于 ， 属性表示与之关联的子菜单项。For a , the property represents the submenu items associated with it. 除了为所有派生菜单类提供的属性外， 类还提供了一些方法，如 和 ，使您可以从现有菜单创建新菜单，还可以将两个菜单结构合并在一起。In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the class also provides methods, such as and , that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together. 类还定义了嵌套类 。The class also defines the nested class . 此类定义 属性使用的 对象的集合。This class defines the collection of objects used by the property. 您可以使用 类的方法来添加和移除 、或 中的菜单项。You can use the methods of the class to add and remove menu items from a , , or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 来创建窗体的菜单结构。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a menu structure for a form. 示例代码添加了一个用于表示顶级菜单项的 ，向其中添加了一个子菜单项用于选择字体大小，然后将两个子菜单项添加到了应用程序中表示大和小字体选择的菜单项。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 该示例要求有一个名为 `mainMenu1` 的 对象和一个名为 `menuItem1`、`menuItem2`、`menuItem3`和 `menuItem4`的四个 对象。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. [!code-cpp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Menu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 对象的整个列表（存储在 `menuSrc`传入的 中）复制到当前菜单中。This method copies the entire list of objects (stored in the passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu. 您可以在派生类中使用此方法来克隆 的对象。You can use this method in your derived class to clone objects. 然后，可由派生自 的其他类重新使用这些类，如 、和 。They can then be reused by other classes that derive from , such as , , and . ## Examples 此示例将创建一个主菜单 `mainMenu1`，其中包含三个菜单项： `File`、`Edit`和 `View`。This example creates a main menu, `mainMenu1`, with three menu items: `File`, `Edit`, and `View`. 然后，它使用 方法将 `mainMenu1` 复制到 `mainMenu2`中。It then uses the method to copy `mainMenu1` into `mainMenu2`. 然后，将克隆的菜单分配给窗体并显示。The cloned menu is then assigned to the form and displayed. 此程序要求您已经创建了一个名为 `Form1`的 。This program requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CloneMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CloneMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收将其占用的内存回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收调用 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放 正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 获取包含该菜单的 。

span.span: Gets the that contains this menu.
The that contains this menu.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许你获取对包含此菜单的 的引用。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the that this menu is contained in. 如果菜单未包含在 中，此属性将返回 `null`。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 如果菜单包含在 或 中，或者如果菜单不包含在任何菜单中，则会发生这种情况。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 您可以使用此属性来确定当前是否正在使用某个菜单，还可以确定其中的位置。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 在此示例中，使用 方法获取对包含 `menuItem1` 或 `menuItem2`的快捷菜单的引用，并在消息框中显示快捷菜单信息。In this example, you use the method to obtain a reference to the shortcut menu that contains `menuItem1` or `menuItem2`, and display the shortcut menu information in a message box. 以编程方式创建一个快捷菜单，其中包含两个项，`New` 和 `Open`。You programmatically create a shortcut menu with two items, `New` and `Open`. 然后通过创建相应的事件处理程序，向这些项添加功能。You then add functionality to these items by creating the appropriate event handlers. 运行该示例时，将显示一个消息框，提示您右键单击该窗体以便显示快捷菜单。When you run the example, you get a message box that tells you to right-click the form in order to display the shortcut menu. 然后，单击菜单项时，会显示另一条消息，告知已单击哪个项目，并在 "包含" 快捷菜单上显示信息。Then, when you click a menu item, you get another message that tells which item has been clicked and displays the information on the containing shortcut menu. 此示例要求您已经创建了一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetContextMenu2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetContextMenu2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含该菜单的 。

The that contains this menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许你获取对该菜单当前所在 的引用。This method allows you to obtain a reference to the this menu is currently located in. 如果菜单未包含在 中，此属性将返回 `null`。This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a . 如果菜单包含在 或 中，或者如果菜单不包含在任何菜单中，则会发生这种情况。This can occur if the menu is contained in a or , or if the menu is not contained in any menu. 您可以使用此属性来确定当前是否正在使用某个菜单，还可以确定其中的位置。You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where. ## Examples 此示例声明一个 、`mainMenu1`和四个菜单项，`menuItem1`、`menuItem2`、`menuItem3`和 `menuItem4`。This example declares a , `mainMenu1`, and four menu items, `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. 只有前三个菜单项添加到 `mainMenu1` 显示。Only the first three menu items are added to `mainMenu1` for display. 然后，该程序将检查是否正在使用 `menuItem3`，这是 `true`的，并确定使用该程序的窗体。The program then checks to see if `menuItem3` is being used, which is `true`, and determines the form in which it is used. 标签文本用于显示承载 的窗体的名称。A label text is used to display the name of the form that hosts the . 如果将所测试的菜单项更改 `menuItem4`，则条件的计算结果为 `false`，因为从未使用过 `menuItem4`。If you change the menu item being tested to `menuItem4`, the condition evaluates to `false` because `menuItem4` has never been used. 此示例要求你创建一个名为 `MyForm` 的 ，其中包含一个名为 `label1`的 。This example requires that you have created a named `MyForm` that includes a named `label1`. [!code-cpp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetMainMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetMainMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来确定是否有任何 对象分配到此菜单。You can use this method to determine whether any objects are assigned to this menu. 这等效于检查 属性中的 `null`。This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有两个 对象的 。The following code example creates a with two objects. 然后，它使用 属性来确定 `mainMenu1` 是否包含菜单项。It then uses the property to determine whether `mainMenu1` contains menu items. 如果条件计算 `true`，则将 属性设置为 `true`，并将主菜单绑定到 。If the condition evaluates `true`, it sets the property to `true` and binds the main menu to the . 此示例要求创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来获取对当前存储在菜单中的菜单项列表的引用。You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu. 对于 和 对象， 属性包含控件中的整个菜单结构。For and objects, the property contains the entire menu structure in the control. 对于 类， 属性包含与 关联的子菜单项的列表。For the class, the property contains the list of submenu items associated with the . 通过引用菜单的菜单项集合的引用（由此属性提供），您可以添加和移除菜单项，确定菜单项的总数，并从集合中清除菜单项的列表。With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection. 有关维护菜单的菜单项集合的详细信息，请参阅 文档。For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建派生类的实例，，并将 对象添加到其 对象的集合中。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds a object to its collection of objects. 此示例要求在此示例中定义的方法位于窗体的类中，并由该窗体类中的方法调用。This example requires that the method defined in this example is located within the class for a form and called by a method in that form class. [!code-cpp[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Menu.MenuItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Menu.MenuItems Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MergeMenu(class System.Windows.Forms.Menu menuSrc) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub MergeMenu (menuSrc As Menu)
abstract member MergeMenu : System.Windows.Forms.Menu -> unit override this.MergeMenu : System.Windows.Forms.Menu -> unit

param.name: menuSrc
param.span: 其菜单项与当前菜单的菜单项合并的 。

span.span: The whose menu items are merged with the menu items of the current menu.

summary.span: 将一个菜单的 对象与当前菜单合并。

span.span: Merges the objects of one menu with the current menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一个菜单 对象与当前菜单合并。This method merges objects from one menu with the current menu. 对象根据 和 属性的值合并。 objects are merged according to the values of the and properties. 菜单合并通常用于合并多文档界面（MDI）父窗体的菜单及其活动 MDI 子窗体的菜单。Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form. 此 .NET Framework 公共语言运行时自动执行。This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime. 例如，如果一个 MDI 父窗体包含一组用于处理文件的菜单，并且您的 MDI 子窗体还具有与文件相关的菜单项，则在 MDI 父窗体中显示子窗体时，菜单集将自动合并到一个文件菜单集中。For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form. 如果要合并不属于 MDI 应用程序的两个菜单结构，可以使用 方法。You can use the method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application. 此实现可由 或 类调用，以合并从 派生的两个或多个对象。This implementation can be called by the or classes to merge two or more objects that derive from . 若要合并两个 对象，请使用 方法。To merge two objects use the method. ## Examples 此示例将创建两个菜单，`mainMenu1` 和 `mainMenu2`。This example creates two menus, `mainMenu1` and `mainMenu2`. 第一个菜单包含一个 ，`File`，第二个菜单包含一个 ，`Edit`。The first menu contains one , `File`, and the second contains one , `Edit`. 使用 方法时，`mainMenu2` 与 `mainMenu1`合并。Using the method, `mainMenu2` is merged with `mainMenu1`. 显示时，`mainMenu1` 将包含两个菜单项，`File` 和 `Edit`。When displayed, `mainMenu1` will contain the two menu items, `File` and `Edit`. 此示例需要你创建了一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MergeMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MergeMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 它已尝试将菜单与自己合并在一起。

span.span: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时，此属性设置为控件的编程标识符。At design time, this property is set to the programmatic identifier of the control. 但在运行时，此属性不会对控件产生任何影响。However, this property has no bearing on the control at run time.
